name: Sin-Cay
description:
A sci-fi adventure with shooter and puzzle elements.
In this game you will plunge into an amazing new world.
The world of the guardian. A world in which reality has been split apart and then sewn back together again.
Shin-kai-"city", the first part of a large-scale and fascinating adventure narrating the journey of a mythical creature torn from his world and time and thrown into the whirlpool of events, in the ruined world of post-communism.
1959 in the Soviet Union finds a mysterious object.
2034, Soviet ideology becomes world leading, all countries unite into a single communist union.
2094 an alien signal is received.
2109 year.....
2402 year, huge dirty hall, in the middle of the room, among the scraps and garbage, there is a box and it seems someone is in it....
12 unique, varied levels.
An interesting and unusual story, which will introduce you to a new, vast universe.
The gameplay takes 2-4 hours.
Five parts of the game are planned.
